name: Polarised (Maestro)
description:
Put your button mashing skills to test with this confusing puzzle-platformer. This game may make you rage if you aren't the patient guy. Made for Game Endeavor Jam #3.

Controls For Keyboard
  • Use A and D to move
  • Use W and Space to jump
  • Use Q and E to separate Blue and Green parts
  • Use F to join the parts from any position of the map to the currently active part
For Controller/Joypad/Gamepad
  • Use Left Stick to move and jump
  • Use A to jump (alternative)
  • Use X and B to separate Blue and Green parts
  • Use Y to join the parts from any position of the map to the currently active part
Credits
  • The music for this game was taken from https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata
  • The SFX for this game was taken from  https://opengameart.org/content/9-sci-fi-computer-sounds-and-beeps
  • The Game Engine used for making the game was Godot Game Engine
